definition: this road is blocked/fig. This method does not work./Doing this is no good.
this/these
road/CL:條|条[tiao2]/journey/route/line (bus etc)/sort/kind
surname Lu
(negative prefix)/not/no
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: That sign means that the road is blocked.
sentences.chinese: 這個符號暗示此路不通。

sentences.english: No Through Route For Pedestrians Detour.
A road sign on a crossing which saying "Road Closed Please Go Straight".
sentences.chinese: 在路口擺放“此路不通請直行”的牌子。

sentences.english: The flashing lights mean that the road is blocked. ?
sentences.chinese: 那閃動的燈光表示此路不通。

sentences.english: The sign means that the road is blocked.
sentences.chinese: 這個標誌表示此路不通。

sentences.english: The light at the end of the tunnel is usually a "No Exit" sign.
sentences.chinese: 隧道盡頭的光標往往寫着“此路不通”。

sentences.english: That sign means the road is closed.
sentences.chinese: 那告示牌上指著此路不通。

sentences.english: We cannot be here now…and also be everywhere at once.
sentences.chinese: 此路不通，而且我們同時還分身乏術。
